featuredProjects.title: Modern Portfolio Website
featuredProjects.description: A personal portfolio website built with React and Framer Motion.
featuredProjects.longDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my work and skills. Features dark mode support, smooth animations, and a clean design aesthetic.

featuredProjects.title: E-commerce Dashboard
featuredProjects.description: Admin dashboard for managing products and orders with analytics.
featuredProjects.longDescription: A comprehensive admin dashboard for e-commerce businesses. Includes real-time analytics, order management, and inventory tracking features.

featuredProjects.title: Weather Application
featuredProjects.description: Real-time weather app with location-based forecasts and maps.
featuredProjects.longDescription: A weather application that provides real-time forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather information for any location worldwide.

featuredProjects.title: Task Management App
featuredProjects.description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates.
featuredProjects.longDescription: A real-time task management application designed for team collaboration. Features include task assignment, progress tracking, and team chat.
